Blog.post: Wat Dirty Dawgs. Wow Been a wile. So anywayz. wats up y'all. Damn Man I need sleep i culdnt been able to sleep for a long time. I got a lot of shit on my mind thats prolly why. but who cares.Well Summer School Is Shitty But Wat School Aint. HAHAHA Wow I Hav fun tho after school I run or play B-Ball or go swimmin. Peace out tony

Hey Dawgs I am finally gonna settle down. I found the girl of my dreams. WOW. She is everything I could ever ask for. I am So happy to be with her. I love her soo much and she Loves me I think later im gonna ask her to marry me that is gonna be awesome. Peace out Tony

What Up Peeps. If Y'all Dont Know Why Im Happy U Dont KNow Me Then! School Is For The Summer, YES!!! Finally Took Forever Let Me Tell You How My School Year Was. Long, Horrible, Tragic, and Fun. Fun Because I Met Alot Of Cool Friends. Chris, Justin M, Justin H, Cody, Grant, Sando, Jason, Andy, Ron, Sam, Zach, Austin, Josh, Earl, Chris B, Track People On The Team. I Had A Blast This Year. Long because I Moved Here Bout Half Way Through The 1st Term Of The 1st Semester. Horrible Because It Was Really Boring. Tragic Because Its School So U KNow How It Is. Peace Out Tony

What The Fuck Is Up? Really WOW I Really Dont Care. Couldnt Come Write Yesterday Because I Had To Drive Tractors To Big Gust Day First Of All. But The 2nd Part Is My Favorite Part Of The Day When I Went To The Demolition Derby And Was With The Girl I Like And It Was All Great. I Have So Much Fun With Her. She Is Just Great. She Makes Me Feel Like Im The Luckiest Man In The World. Today I Got To Work So Its All Good And Then On The 14th Of June I Got Drivers' Ed. YAY!I FINALLY GET MY LISENCE BACK! Peace Out Tony A.K.A. Ohio

O Yea Baby Cant Wait 2 More Days Of School then a week break then back to school for a month. But Fuck Man Saturday Is Gonna Be The Shit Im Gonna Hang Out With The Girl I Like So Much. Hopefully A Certain Someone Wont Be There To Ruin Anything. But Fuck Man I Got Drivers' Ed This Summer Be OK Better Than Sitting Around But Not Better Than Playing Video Games. HEHEHE. Peace Out *KISS KISS BABY*

Wow 2 in a day dont get used to this. I am falling for this girl so much WOW. She is so awesome and cute, great since of humor, funny, and just WOW. *KISS KISS* BABY. Thats All I Need To Say I think. O Yea Almost forgot Sammi If U Try To Ruin This U Will Lose More Than A Friend U Prolly Wont Have A BF. OK SO DONT FUCK WITH ME!!

Hey People, What The Fuck Is Up? No one cares especially me. I got myself a blog now Y'all better recognize now Im posting all my thoughts good, bad, racist, sexist, and even bout people. Yup this is gonna be the shiznit. Fuck Man but Nah im not just gonna Fuck with people Im gonna be a one time psycyratrist. HEHEHE!My First Solution is shut the fuck up and listen God Gave you 2 ears and 1 mouth for a reason! Speaking of which Sammi posted the freakiest and most ICK thing ever her and Nick were doing Shit they shouldnt of been doing and she kept picturing me and almost screamed my name in pleasure. GOD THAT IS FUCKING NASTY!! Well My first "BLOG" is complete! Peace Out Ghetto Homie Style P.S. Comment all u want
